postText: Today we're sharing that View Transitions and Activity are ready to try in the experimental channel, along with docs and updates on other areas we're actively working on:

View Transitions are now ready to try in react@experimental.
They‚Äôve been tested in production and are stable, but the final API may change as we iterate on feedback. Check out the docs to see how to add animations to your React app:

name: @code
postText:
There are two new modes that floating windows can have: 
- Compact, which hides certain UI elements.
- Always-on-top, which stays on top of all other windows
Pro tip: use it with the Chat view.

name: @typescript
postText: Today we're thrilled to announce our effort to port the TypeScript compiler and language service to native code, gaining a 10x speed boost in build times and editor responsiveness!

name: @typescript
postText:
Today we're announcing previews of the native port of TypeScript! These nightly previews will be available on npm and the VS Code marketplace!
npm install -D @‚Äãtypescript/native-preview
npx tsgo --version
Read up more on our blog!
